One episode has been added to downloads.

View what\'s new in this version.
Download only when connected to Wi-Fi.
Erase data and restore from backup?

Create a virtual podcast repository by selecting a directory on your device. Each media file in the selected directory will be imported as episode. You can manually add or remove media files into the directory later.
Update podcasts only when connected to Wi-Fi.
Display artwork on lock screen when playing.
Update podcasts only when battery is charging.
Load artworks only when connected to Wi-Fi.
Auto delete played item from playlists.
Start downloading only when battery is charging.
Mark episode as played if more than %1$d%% has been played.
Start downloading when episode is added to playlist.
Filter episodes for auto download. Requires to have auto download option enabled first.
Keep the download of favorite episode from being auto deleted.
Sub-directory found. Create a new virtual podcast for each sub-directory?
Dim screen but keep screen responsive.
Display up to three controls in compact/lockscreen notification:
Warning: reset episode data will remove downloads of this podcast!
Episode Url has been copied to clipboard.
Continue to play next episode when playback error occurs.

"Don't download episode if matching all keywords: %1$s."
"Don't download episode if matching any of the keywords: %1$s."
"[%1$s] is not found. Add this podcast by URL?"
Double tap to play or pause
Swipe up to play next in playlist
Swipe to left to fast rewind
Swipe to right to fast forward
Allow to download with data services when roaming.
No more episodes to play from playlist [%1$s].

Reset episodes will discard cached episodes and rebuild episodes from the podcast feed.
Open menu drawer on the right side.
Episode [%1$s] is still downloading. Can not play it.
Click to open full screen player view.
Keep latest %1$d downloads for each podcast.
"[%1$s] is not found. Add this station by URL?"
If no image specified, any image file found in the virtual podcast directory will be used as the default artwork.
Wi-Fi is not available. Cancelling podcast update checking.
Pull down the playlist to start podcast update checking.
Pull down download list to start podcast update checking.
Pull down podcasts list to start podcast update checking.
Pull down episodes list to start podcast update checking.
Drag the handler to sort manually.
Enter the username and password below if your podcast requires authentication. Leave them empty if no authentication is required.
Add to the following playlists when adding an episode to a playlist

Can not play the local file!
Sync subscription and episode playback progress.
Enable auto backup of app settings and database.
Import subscriptions from an OPML file.
Export subscriptions to an OPML file.
Create a backup of app settings and database.
Restore app settings and database from selected backup.
When a download is removed due to the keep downloads limit has been reached.
Update podcasts when app is starting.

There are no episodes in this playlist.
Mark all previous episodes as played

Up Next list has been updated to play from: %1$s.
Do a full syncing. Will take much longer to finish.
If you enjoy using Podcast Republic app and you would like to support the development, you can buy me a cup of coffee. Thanks!
Failed: URL could not be found.
Podcast title can not be empty!
Podcast URL can not be empty!
You have not set up the podcast download directory yet. Do you like to select a directory as the download directory now?
At least one playlist is required!
Syncing account login failed, please try logging in again.
No podcasts found! Press the Add (+) button to add a podcast.
Add a YouTube channel or playlist as a podcast.
Set up a virtual podcast to play music or audiobooks on your device.
Click to set up sleep timer.
At least one episode filter is required!
The following directories are not accessible. Please reset in the Settings.\n%1$s
The following files are found in the download directory but not linked to any downloads. You can remove them by pressing the \"Clean up\" button.
Please don\'t close the app when it is restoring the data. It will restart when all data are restored.
Number of episodes to auto download
Automatically download up to %1$d most recent episodes when new episodes are retrieved.
Notify when new episodes are available.
The username and password you entered don\'t match.
Could not log in, please try again later.
Password must be at least %1$d characters long.
Username is already taken, please choose a different one.
Passwords don\'t match, please try again.
Email is invalid, please correct it and try again.
Email is already taken, please reset your password instead.
Could not sign up, please try again later.
Enter your email to recover your password
Failed to request password reset, please try again.
Please check your email for instructions on how to access your account.
Continue to play next playlist after all episodes have been played in current playlist.
Download location is not accessible. Set up the download location now?
Insufficient space. Please free some storage space.
You won\'t be able to login this account again! Continue to delete account?
Notify when an episode has been downloaded.
Switching between light theme (day) and dark theme (night) based on the time of day.
Allow to download at any time.
Allow to download between selected time.
Paused: waiting for allowed download time.
This is the text size zoomed to %1$d%%.
Continue to delete the selected virtual podcast files from your storage?
Can not edit this chapter. Only user added chapters are editable.
Import downloads from selected directory. This operation will only import podcast files which are downloaded by this app before.
By clicking Report a bug, you agree to our Terms and that you have read our Privacy Policy.
By clicking Create account, you agree to our Terms and that you have read our Privacy Policy.
By clicking Sign in, you agree to our Terms and that you have read our Privacy Policy.
Automatically turn on sleep timer when playback starts.
Syncing data only when connected to Wi-Fi network.
"We\'ve detected a crash in the app before. Would you like to send the crash report so we can fix the problem?"
Auto download up to %1$d newer and unplayed episodes from current playing podcast.
Ignore the Wi-Fi and battery settings, just download the episode with current network connection now! This may use your mobile data and battery. Continue?
Play all from old to new
Deleted downloads will be removed after 24 hours.
Keep the downloaded podcast file for 24 hours after being deleted.
Be the first to write a review!
Are you sure to clear the play queue?
See what\'s new in this version: %1$s.
Can not edit default episode filter!
Higher priority playlist will be played first.
Click on the tab again to view all your playlists.
Click on the tab again to view all your podcast tags.
Changing the play mode to repeat a playlist:
- Removing from playlist on played will be disabled
- Removing downloaded podcast file on played will be disabled
Click on the tab again to view all your episode filters.
Stop playing when time is up
Play all from new to old
Check for new episodes after completing the newest episode in the podcast.
Click on the tab again to view download actions.
Remember last played volume level and restore to it on playback starts.
Allow to download over metered network.

Start playing and go to Now Playing
No radio stations found. Press the Add (+) button to add a radio station.
No RSS feeds found. Press the Add (+) button to add a feed.
Select episodes with duration greater than %1$d minutes.
Select episodes with duration less than %1$d minutes.
Allow to stream podcasts only when Wi-Fi is connected.
Allow to stream radios only when Wi-Fi is connected.
You\'ve reordered the Up Next list. As a result the Up Next will not be synced with the currently playing episode list or playlist.
Automatically rewind %1$d to %2$d seconds when resuming the playback.
If no repeating days are selected the alarm will only be fired once.
There are no episodes with notes!
You will be redirected to Android file manager. Please select a directory on internal storage or SD card to be used as the download location.
Do you know this app uses WiFi only by default? You can turn off WiFi only if you have fast data connection. Do you want to review the WiFi only settings now?
Delete virtual podcast file from storage after being played.
Remove the episode from playlist after being played.
Apply this change to all playlists?
Allow to overwrite volume mute state and restore to last played volume level.
Auto download up to %1$d older and unplayed episodes from current playing podcast.
Ignore articles (A, An, or The) in podcast title when sorting by title.
Allow to use mobile data and ignore battery restrictions when downloading episodes.
Only include episodes with user notes.
Pick an image as the shortcut icon
Only include episodes with user chapters.
Add new episodes to selected playlists automatically.
You haven\'t left any reviews yet.
Animate items when loading into list.
Account already exists, please login with the email and password.
Automatically pause sleep timer when playback is paused.
Automatically turn on sleep timer when start playing between the selected time [%1$s - %2$s].
Error: \"Start time\" and \"End time\" can not be same!
Apply audio effects to all podcasts and radio stations?
Allow to download oldest unplayed episodes if no newer unplayed episodes found.
Allow to download newest unplayed episodes if no older unplayed episodes found.
Automatically load last played episode in the playlist into \'Now playing\'.
Display episode artwork retrieved from podcast feed.
Use podcast artwork as episode artwork.
Prefer to use artwork extracted from downloaded podcast file.
Display episode artwork retrieved from media file.
Select backup file to restore from

Tips: Android file manager will be opened to complete the restore processing. Please navigate to where the backup file is located and then hold down the file to the select it. The default backup file is named in the format of backup_date.zip
Back up to Google Drive only when Wi-Fi is connected.
Download episode if duration is greater than %d minutes.
Download episode if duration is less than %d_minutes.
Don\'t download episode if duration is greater than %d minutes.
Don\'t download episode if duration is less than %d minutes.
Feed title can not be empty!
RSS feed URL can not be empty!
Remove obsolete episodes if they are no longer present in the podcast feed.
Allow to change playback position from notification.
Use this playlist as the default playlist.
Obsolete episodes will always be removed for YouTube podcast.

When updating RSS feeds retrieve full article only if connected to Wi-Fi.
Follow Android system\'s dark theme setup.
Do not start playing upon Bluetooth is connected. Check out FAQs for more info.

Mark all next articles as read
